title: If you could assign a slogan to life itself, what would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1-Never ever poke your nose in other business,its very frustrating to both of you. 2-enjoy your own company,oneday everyone leaves. 3-first become a rich then philosopher. 4-smile Everytime because it confuse people. If you like my thoughts then do upvotes .Because it motivates me to write
